pageContext.claim: “I was asking a sarcastic -- and a very sarcastic question to the reporters in the room about disinfectant on the inside. But it does kill it, and it would kill it on the hands, and that would make things much better. That was done in the form of a sarcastic question to the reporters.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump clearly was not being sarcastic when he suggested injecting bleach as a disinfectant. He was at a news conference, but he was not speaking to reporters; he had turned to address a clearly uncomfortable Deborah Birx, the coronavirus task force coordinator.
